name: Toongini's Bounty (JAM DEMO)
description:
Controls:

Arrow keys: Movement

Z: Interact

X: Cancel

-----------------------------------------

Short personal description:

I tried seeing if I could get graphics and gameplay but could only get graphics done in time. It's playable and can be finished in 2 minutes. Enjoy the nice music and environments.

Music used exclusively from gyms ARCHIVE https://soundcloud.com/gyms-archive/sets/gyms-archive

Everything is made by me except for the music.
